input.sentences: me and my husband went to a spot overlooking a local beach .
the lighthouse was really cute up close .
it was also a really beautiful scene from further away .
i wonder how far that jet stream goes !
output.sentences: From the helicopter, we saw the spot locals talked about so often.
The lovebirds behind me were even interested.
We planned to stay in the curiously cute bunkhouse that was close to the lighthouse.
Who could have imagined such a beautiful scene of ocean waves and big open sky?
Only to have a guy riding a jet ski ruin my stream of consciousness.
